import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './MembershipRegister.css'; // Import the CSS file const MembershipRegister = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ surname: '', name: '', otherName: '', homeAddress: '', dob: '', townCity: '', localGovt: '', passportId: '', codiceFiscale: '', phone: '', nextOfKinName: '', nextOfKinPhone: '', nextOfKinAddress: '', nextOfKinCity: '', nextOfKinCountry: '', isMarried: '', partnerName: '', // New field for partner name childrenCount: '', // New field for number of children childrenNames: '', // New field for children names parentsStatus: '', association: '', criminalRecord: '', reason: '', agreement: false, }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }); }; const handleCheckboxChange = () => { setFormData({ ...formData, agreement: !formData.agreement, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // You can add your form submission logic here console.log(formData); }; return (
